title: NEWZ065 The First Fix Is Always Free
description: A super typhoon destroys parts of the Philippines as the world scrambles to help with rescue and recovery.  While the outgoing government in Bangladesh formally recognizes Hijras as a separate gender. The Israeli cabinet approves the destruction of a Bedouin town ahead of a supreme court decision. Over in California, an Oakland school will be the first of its kind to have a gunshot detection system.  And new research shows that the Montreal protocol accidentally helped slow global warming. This week's NEWZ Source: Climate Central. Lastly today, Mark has a new project on kickstarter entitled "The Dubai Taxi Driver", read all about it.
itunes:author: Metaebene Personal Media - Tim Pritlove
itunes:subtitle: Typhoon Haiyan – Hijras in Bangladesh – Bedouin Town Demolished – Oakland Gunshot Detection – Ozone Treaty – ClimateCentral – The Dubai Taxi Driver

content:encoded:
Typhoon Haiyan – Hijras in Bangladesh – Bedouin Town Demolished – Oakland Gunshot Detection – Ozone Treaty – ClimateCentral – The Dubai Taxi Driver

A super typhoon destroys parts of the Philippines as the world scrambles to help with rescue and recovery. While the outgoing government in Bangladesh formally recognizes Hijras as a separate gender. The Israeli cabinet approves the destruction of a Bedouin town ahead of a supreme court decision. Over in California, an Oakland school will be the first of its kind to have a gunshot detection system. And new research shows that the Montreal protocol accidentally helped slow global warming. This week's NEWZ Source: Climate Central. Lastly today, Mark has a new project on kickstarter entitled "The Dubai Taxi Driver", read all about it.
